title: Coronavirus: Swimming Canada backs U.S. in concerns over Olympics - Global News

content: OTTAWA Swimming Canada says it backs its rivals from the United States when it comes to finding a solution for the Olympic Games Early Friday the head of USA Swimming sent a letter urging the U S Olympic and Paralympic Committee to push the Internation chars
